headline: Uber Jury Verdict Raises Fresh Questions On Safety Risks And Valuation
summary: A federal jury found Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) liable in a 2023 passenger sexual assault case and ordered the company to pay compensation. The case is the first trial within multidistrict litigation that includes thousands of similar claims against Uber. Court proceedings highlighted concerns around Uber's internal safety algorithms, risk assessment processes, and broader exposure to litigation. For investors watching Uber at a share price of $74.77, this ruling adds a fresh layer of...
